text:
Blake Lively was one of many celebrities that took a stand on social media in support of trans rights after President Donald Trump announced a ban of transgender military service members.

Lively took a moment to respond directly to one troll on Instagram who wrote, "You catching that unfollow for this." Her reminder to that user was that love is greater than hate.

"I choose love. That's the only thing that we all have," she wrote. "It is peace. It is happiness. Not follows or unfollows. I wish happiness for you. And I hope you find that your heart has a bigger capacity than you give it credit for. I know it does."
title: Blake Lively Defends Transgender Troops After Trump Ban
